dc:title: Healthy Diet and Physical Activity for Cardiovascular Disease Prevention in Adults With Cardiovascular Risk Factors: Behavioral Counseling Interventions
dc:description:
The USPSTF recommends that:
For adults 18 years or older at increased risk of cardiovascular disease (CVD):
Provide behavioral counseling to promote a healthy diet and physical activity.
Grade: B

schema:creator.schema:affiliation: Knowledge Systems Lab, University of Michigan Medical School

koio:hasTest.dc:title: Knowledge test
koio:hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the accuracy of the knowledge implementation.

koio:hasTest.dc:title: Implementation tests
koio:hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the use of superclass KO to implement this knowledge object.

koio:hasDocumentation.dc:title: Healthy Diet and Physical Activity for Cardiovascular Disease Prevention in Adults With Cardiovascular Risk Factors: Behavioral Counseling Interventions
koio:hasDocumentation.dc:description: This is the USPSTF documentation webpage for Healthy Diet and Physical Activity for Cardiovascular Disease Prevention recommendation.

koio:hasDocumentation.dc:title: Using the Healthy Diet and Physical Activity for Cardiovascular Disease Prevention in Adults With Cardiovascular Risk Factors Knowledge Object: A Step-by-Step Tutorial
koio:hasDocumentation.dc:description:
This Google Colab tutorial demonstrates three different ways to use the cardiovascular-prevention-diet-activity knowledge object:
  • using the built-in command-line interface (CLI) service
  • using the python activator
  • using the knowledge object's knowledge representation directly in the code
